title: annie jungle
body: is annie jungle any good? i think her ganks will be good because of the stun but im not sure if she could kill the jungle minions. if i was to annie jungle what runes and masteries do i need?

replies.body: Main problem is that the first clears are completely garbage (I tried it a few times when cinderhulk was OP, runeglaive is probably better now though). You have to back after the first 2-3 camps and frequently after that in the early levels. Once you have a jungle item completed its not terrible though, and the ganks are good if you manage your passive properly. You can pull it off if you really want, it's certainly not amazing though. I'd recommend AS marks, armour seals, AP glyphs/quints and 21/9/0 with the AP/AD/AS stuff in the offensive tree to help get through the early levels

I just found after the first few ganks I couldn't gank anymore because I had no gap closer and with all the warding that goes on it became literally useless.

Like did ok with clears, got a few OP ganks early then scaled off wickedly because you lack sustain and don't get anywhere near as much Gold in the Jungle without Shyv type clears.

If you are going to do it I suggest a few early ganks then just go duo with your top laner or it becomes completely useless.
annie is one of the last champs id jungle with, outside of bots hint hint
